mapper.select: select address_id, user_id, province_code, city_code, region_code, community_id, nickname, telephone, complete_address, active, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark from mall_user_address where address_id = #{addressId}
mapper.insert: insert into mall_user_address(user_id, province_code, city_code, region_code, community_id, nickname, telephone, complete_address, active, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark) values (#{userId}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{regionCode}, #{communityId}, #{nickname}, #{telephone}, #{completeAddress}, #{active}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{remark})

insert into mall_user_address(user_id, province_code, city_code, region_code, community_id, nickname, telephone, complete_address, active, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.provinceCode}, #{entity.cityCode}, #{entity.regionCode}, #{entity.communityId}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.telephone}, #{entity.completeAddress}, #{entity.active}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.remark})

insert into mall_user_address(user_id, province_code, city_code, region_code, community_id, nickname, telephone, complete_address, active, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.provinceCode}, #{entity.cityCode}, #{entity.regionCode}, #{entity.communityId}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.telephone}, #{entity.completeAddress}, #{entity.active}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id), province_code = values(province_code), city_code = values(city_code), region_code = values(region_code), community_id = values(community_id), nickname = values(nickname), telephone = values(telephone), complete_address = values(complete_address), active = values(active), create_time = values(create_time), create_by = values(create_by), update_time = values(update_time), update_by = values(update_by), remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update mall_user_address
user_id = #{userId},
province_code = #{provinceCode},
city_code = #{cityCode},
region_code = #{regionCode},
community_id = #{communityId},
nickname = #{nickname},
telephone = #{telephone},
complete_address = #{completeAddress},
active = #{active},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
remark = #{remark},
where address_id = #{addressId}
